body_html:
Yes, I was using Cuda 7.0 and Cudnn 6.5 on an EC2 g2.2xlarge instance with this AIM:
cuda_7 - ami-12fd8178
ubuntu 14.04, gcc 4.8, cuda 7.0, atlas, and opencv.
To build, I followed the instructions on tensorflow.org.

body:
Yes, I was using Cuda 7.0 and Cudnn 6.5 on an EC2 g2.2xlarge instance with this AIM:
cuda_7 - ami-12fd8178
ubuntu 14.04, gcc 4.8, cuda 7.0, atlas, and opencv.
To build, I followed the instructions on tensorflow.org.
